text:
I have a workflow with a webhook and a server  response `{"hs_server_response":-19}`
but the formatting `number([action_outputs.action_output_1.hs_server_response])`
results in `0.0`
it works correctly with positive numbers

Hi Delali, What is the workflow that causes the form submission request to take place? Also do you need the object instance to be created and then send a form related to that specific custom object record? From there I will be able to more easily answer your question if you can use oob workflow capabilities or if there is a small amount of code to do it!

Hi Everyone,

We're currently have two instances of HubSpot and are in the process of figuring out how to transfer company records from one HubSpot portal to another. We're using Ops Hub Enterprise but could use some guidance on the most effective approach for setting up a *HubSpot-to-HubSpot webhook.*
Any insights, experiences, or suggestions from the community would be immensely helpful. Thanks in advance for your feedback!

Hello Everyone, I have a phone formatter running for one of our clients but the extension numbers are throwing errors. Does anyone know what the internal value is for just the phone number (excluding the extension) so I can have the workflow action just look at that vs that and the extensions? The UI makes us believe that they are storing it on two different properties on the backend but unsure.

Example: I just want the number in the box vs both.
